title: Dark Consent
description: This is the newly edited version of the original story.To the average person, Stefan Kornak would seem to be just a man. However, his dark secret lies in an ancient brotherhood of blood.Taylor Brixton has something that no other woman on Earth possesses, the key to Stefan’s fancy. Now that he has found her, an insatiable flame of passion and desire has been lit.Hunting her down and claiming her will not be enough. Taylor has become a beacon of sexual promise for others like Stefan. And Stefan doesn’t like to share. He’ll have to fight off the others if he wants to keep Taylor all to himself. But it won’t be easy. The war will continue until he can convince her to surrender herself entirely to him.This is the first installment of the "Dark Vampire Series" written by Jade Cooper, published by eroticaromance.netThis book is considered erotica writing and is intended for adults only. The author uses language and situations that some people may find offensive.
author: Jade Cooper
